name: Wetland Patch Density (O/E)
functionStatement: Wetlands occur as a connected mosaic that supports storage and retention consistent with reference.
descriptionMarkdown: Observed wetland patch density divided by expected/reference (O/E). Values near 1 are best.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Count wetland polygons within floodplain; compute patches per km² (or per km valley); divide by expected/reference.

inputs.label: Wetland Patch Density (O/E)
inputs.helpMarkdown: NWI polygons within floodplain + reference reach/region comparison.

references: regional wetland reference summaries where available.

stratifications.name: Proposed (derived from SFARI rapid curves) - Use physiographic region; separate large complexes vs small patches if needed.
